Name: Mini Tekton
About the game: Mini Tekton is a physics puzzle game , use creativity and imagination in various scenarios that challenge you in new ways or have fun in Sandbox building great structures or crush them! Key Features : -18 Scenarios ( Levels ). -Sandbox mode. -More than 20 combinations of building materials.
